global_previous.describe: Global keybind for previous song.Uses gtk notation for keybinds.

global_play_pause.describe: Global keybind for play/pause.Uses gtk notation for keybinds.

curses_transparency.describe: Set true to make curses transparency.

global_next.describe: Global keybind for next song.Uses gtk notation for keybinds.

cache.describe: A toggle to enable cache function or not. Set value to true to enable it.

aria2c_parameters.describe: The additional parameters when aria2c start to download something.

mpg123_parameters.describe: The additional parameters when mpg123 start.

music_quality.describe: Select the quality of the music. May be useful when network is terrible. 0 for high quality, 1 for medium and 2 for low.
